Dear {!References__c.Referee__c} {!References__c.Applicant__c} has applied to undertake the {!References__c.Applied_Programme__c} at the Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine and has indicated you as their referee.
We would appreciate your comments on the candidateâ€™s professional and/or academic abilities and their suitability for their chosen course of study.
References must be signed, dated and appear on headed paper, or bear an official stamp.
To upload a reference please click on the following link:
{!References__c.Upload_URL__c}
Please note that under the Data Protection Act 1998, LSTM may have to provide the candidate with a copy of the reference you have written, if they formally request it.
If you are not able to provide a reference for {!References__c.Applicant__c}, I would be grateful if you could reply to this email, stating your reasons.
Yours sincerely
Admissions Team Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine
www.lstmed.ac.uk
